author: Sheldon H. Jacobson, opinion contributor
description: If there is any hope that our nation will be able to climb out of its current fiscal quagmire, money spent by the government should have some positive return on investment.
title: Another Congress, another costly continuing resolution

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: The United Nations (UN) cast blame on President Trump and the media for a stalled escalator and an inoperable teleprompter on Tuesday, after the president denounced the international body for the technology mishaps ahead of his speech before the General Assembly.  A safety mechanism was triggered by a videographer on the moving stairway ahead of...
title: UN blames Trump team for nonworking escalator, teleprompter

author: Laura Kelly
description: NEW YORK — Syria’s interim President Ahmed al-Sharaa said ahead of a historic speech before the U.N. General Assembly that Israel is stalling on moving forward with a peace agreement between the two countries. Al-Sharaa’s remarks late Tuesday signaled a departure from statements he made only 24 hours earlier when he claimed Syria had reached...
title: Syria's president says Israel 'stalling' on peace agreement

author: Edward Verona, opinion contributor
description: ExxonMobil made the right call in continuing to stay out of Russia’s latest disaster.
title: ExxonMobil is right on Russia — a return would be a disaster

author: Vinay Simlot
description: NASA announced the Artemis II mission to ferry astronauts around the moon for the first time in more than 50 years, could launch earlier than expected.
title: NASA could launch manned moon mission by February 2026

author: Zach Kaplan
description: This decline can be attributed to rising home prices, general economic uncertainty and mortgage rates, which remain double their pandemic low.
title: Summer 2025 was strongest homebuyer's market in over a decade

author: Artem Kolisnichenko, opinion contributor
description: The Pentagon is sending up to 600 military lawyers into immigration courts.
title: It's not just DC or the border — the military is also invading our immigration courts

author: Colin Meyn
description: Trump said he wants to "test" ABC in the wake of Jimmy Kimmel's return to late-night.
title: 'Backfired bigly': Kimmel jabs Trump push to remove him

author: Mike Lillis
description: House Democrats have launched a series of investigations into Tom Homan, President Trump’s border czar, amid allegations that he accepted $50,000 in cash from undercover FBI agents as part of an influence-peddling probe.  Rep. Jamie Raskin (Md.), the top Democrat on the House Judiciary Committee, is pressing the Justice Department to turn over a reported tape showing...
title: Dems launch probes into Trump’s border czar amid bribe allegations

author: Al Weaver
description: President Trump and GOP lawmakers are itching to make a potential government shutdown as painful as possible for Democrats as negotiations show few signs of progress with less than a week to go. Republicans and Democrats have talked past each other for weeks, with each side refusing to pivot from their calls for a seven-week...
title: GOP hopes to make potential shutdown as painful for Dems as possible

author: Alexander Bolton
description: Republican senators are growing increasingly uncomfortable over President Trump's unconventional forays into health policy, specifically the president's support for Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and his attempts to rewrite the children's vaccination schedule despite strong skepticism from the medical community. One lawmaker said Republicans are "starting to break ranks" over it....
title: GOP senators alarmed over Kennedy’s impact on Trump’s unorthodox health recommendations

author: Julia Manchester
description: The number of registered independent voters is on the rise in the U.S., forcing campaigns to grapple with tough questions about how to target these voters ahead of next year’s midterms and the 2028 presidential election. According to a recent report from The Hill’s partners at Decision Desk HQ, a majority of U.S. states are...
title: Growing number of independent voters poses challenges for both parties

author: Julia Shapero
description: President Trump’s decision to raise the fee for H-1B visa applications to $100,000 is sending shock waves through Silicon Valley, as the changes enact new hurdles to hiring foreign talent in the U.S. tech industry. The administration has argued the hefty new fee on visas for highly skilled foreign workers will encourage companies to instead...
title: Trump's $100K H-1B visa fee rattles Silicon Valley

author: Dominick Mastrangelo
description: Comedian Jimmy Kimmel returned to his late night perch on Tuesday, giving an emotional response to the backlash his comments last week on the killing of Charlie Kirk sparked and speaking out against what he said was an attempt to silence him by the Trump administration. "Maybe most of all I want to thank the...
title: Jimmy Kimmel rips Brendan Carr, Trump in  tearful return to late night

author: Caroline Vakil
description: Former Pima County supervisor Adelita Grijalva easily won a special election on Tuesday in Arizona’s 7th Congressional District to fill the seat held by her late father, former Rep. Raúl Grijalva (D-Ariz.). Grijalva beat Republican Daniel Butierez to represent a House seat in the Grand Canyon State that spans most of the state’s southern border and includes...
title: Key takeaways from special elections in Arizona and Georgia

author: Caroline Vakil
description: Former Pima County supervisor Adelita Grijalva (D) is projected to win the special election to fill the House seat held by her late father, former Rep. Raúl Grijalva (D-Ariz.), according to Decision Desk HQ.  Grijalva beat Republican small businessowner Daniel Butierez in the general election in Arizona’s 7th Congressional District, which spans most of the state’s southern...
title: Democrat Adelita Grijalva wins special election to fill father's House seat in Arizona

author: Elvia Limon
description: President Trump on Tuesday night slammed ABC for reinstating comedian Jimmy Kimmel after pulling the late-night host off the air last week, and he suggested at possibly taking action against the television network. “I can’t believe ABC Fake News gave Jimmy Kimmel his job back. The White House was told by ABC that his Show was cancelled,”...
title: Trump slams ABC for bringing Kimmel back

author: Tara Suter
description: Podcaster Joe Rogan offered his opinion on the recent suspension of late-night host Jimmy Kimmel by ABC in a podcast episode released Tuesday. “First of all, I definitely don't think that the government should be involved — ever — in dictating what a comedian can or cannot say in a monologue, that’s f------ crazy,” Rogan...
title: Rogan pushes back on Kimmel suspension

author: Nathaniel Weixel
description: Click in for more news from The Hill {beacon} Health Care Health Care   The Big Story  Global health authorities, US lawmakers rebut Trump’s Tylenol claims  Major health authorities from around the world and lawmakers at home are pushing back on President Trump’s claim yesterday that a common over-the-counter pain reliever could be linked to...
title: Global health authorities, US lawmakers rebut Trump’s Tylenol claims
